I asked my wife how often she uses an LLM.

She didnâ€™t know what that meant.

So I asked her if she uses ChatGPT, expecting to hear her say a couple times/week.

Nope, 5-6 times/day.

â€œWhat model do you use?â€

No idea what that means. 

But it works well enough.

fullText:

They are expanding rapidly. 

Up to 550k employees, from about 150k 7 years ago 

Huge campus in Beijing being built. See video. 

This was only 1-2 buildings around 2020.

US and Mexico logistics business is expanding. https://t.co/FTpq0eJjGC
